example.text: Business as usual has to end for the cartels. They are making money abusing, assaulting, and killing migrants. I’m supporting HR 2, the Secure the Border Act of 2023 to put a stop to this evil. [[url]]

Key areas of concern are the high rates of cancer for fighter pilots from exposure to radars and neck and spinal cord injuries from pulling “High Gs.” We will work with the VA and the Veterans Committee to ensure we’re doing better to treat both of these service related problems.

Welcome to the 55th Wing family, 831! The replacement and expansion of the WC-135 fleet has been a goal of mine since I commanded the wing. So grateful for the partnership with [[user]], House and Senate committees and [[user]] to make this a reality for [[user]] [[url]]

I am shocked that the UN would acknowledge this designation that is clearly hateful. This event clearly supports hatred and encourages antisemitism, and provided Abbas an opportunity to continue exploiting international bodies to promote his libelous narrative and hatred.
We have made it clear that we will not cut veterans spending, and we stand with the men and women who sacrificed for our country. It’s time to stop spreading lies and start negotiating. [[url]]

Terrorists continue to launch missiles at civilians in Tel Aviv. Most of the missiles were intercepted by the David’s Sling system — saving hundreds of lives. I’ve been a strong supporter of David’s Sling to ensure the people of Israel are protected against terrorists. [[url]]

We are already experiencing a crisis at the southern border and Title 42 ends tomorrow. This week, [[user]] is voting on the Secure the Border Act of 2023. The border is a humanitarian and legal disaster, and we have to take back control for our national security.
